bomb.name: Fire Bomb
bomb.description: Deals fire damage to all enemies. Ignites Oily targets.

smoke_bomb.name: Smoke Bomb
smoke_bomb.description: Obscures the field, allowing escape from most encounters.

mana_dust.name: Mana Dust
mana_dust.description: A glittering dust that restores a small amount of AP.

stamina_herb.name: Stamina Herb
stamina_herb.description: Revitalizing herb used to counter fatigue.

revive_scroll.name: Scroll of Revival
revive_scroll.description: Revives a fallen ally with limited health.

iron_sword.name: Iron Sword
iron_sword.description: A sturdy iron blade favored by mercenaries.

oak_bow.name: Oak Bow
oak_bow.description: A simple bow carved from oak wood.

steel_shield.name: Steel Shield
steel_shield.description: Reliable shield that blocks incoming strikes.

amulet_of_luck.name: Amulet of Luck
amulet_of_luck.description: A charm said to bring fortune in dire moments.

ring_of_vitality.name: Ring of Vitality
ring_of_vitality.description: Grants additional vitality to the wearer.

minor_rune_power.name: Rune of Power
minor_rune_power.description: A small rune that increases attack power.

minor_rune_focus.name: Rune of Focus
minor_rune_focus.description: A rune that sharpens magical focus.

iron_ore.name: Iron Ore
iron_ore.description: Raw ore used by blacksmiths for crafting.

timber.name: Timber
timber.description: Straight lumber harvested from the Charred Forest.

dragon_scale.name: Dragon Scale
dragon_scale.description: A scale shed by an ancient dragon. Radiates power.

mystic_ink.name: Mystic Ink
mystic_ink.description: Ink infused with arcane reagents. Used for scrolls.

blackstone_fragment.name: Blackstone Fragment
blackstone_fragment.description: A shard from the cliffs near Stonefall.

ancient_key.name: Ancient Key
ancient_key.description: Opens a sealed door in the Lost Canyon.

beast_claw.name: Beast Claw
beast_claw.description: Claw taken from a wild beast. Used for weaponcraft.

herbal_tonic.name: Herbal Tonic
herbal_tonic.description: A warm brew of restorative herbs.

holy_symbol.name: Holy Symbol
holy_symbol.description: A blessed symbol that wards against dark forces.

oil_flask.name: Oil Flask
oil_flask.description: Covers enemies in oil. Fire attacks deal bonus damage.

elemental_shard.name: Elemental Shard
elemental_shard.description: A shard that hums with elemental resonance.

beast_hide.name: Beast Hide
beast_hide.description: Tough hide useful for armor crafting.

spirit_charm.name: Spirit Charm
spirit_charm.description: Charm said to attract benevolent spirits.

adventurers_pack.name: Adventurer’s Pack
adventurers_pack.description: Contains essentials for any long journey.

phoenix_feather.name: Phoenix Feather
phoenix_feather.description: Glows faintly warm. Said to revive the dead.

shadow_dust.name: Shadow Dust
shadow_dust.description: A dust that clings to light, used in dark enchantments.

ancient_relic.name: Ancient Relic
ancient_relic.description: A mysterious relic from the ruins of the Azure river valley.

battle_horn.name: Battle Horn
battle_horn.description: Rallies the party, granting temporary Haste.

training_manual.name: Training Manual
training_manual.description: Contains techniques for advanced combat training.

dwarven_ale.name: Dwarven Ale
dwarven_ale.description: A strong brew that bolsters defense.

healing_salve.name: Healing Salve
healing_salve.description: A salve applied to wounds for moderate healing.
